20110127010004.000|20110127010004.000|CC1|LOCKDOWN.                       
20110127010004.000|20110127010006.000|CC1|THIS TIME NO SHOTS WERE FIRED,  
20110127010006.000|20110127010008.000|CC1|NO WEAPON WAS FOUND ON CAMPUS.  
20110127010008.000|20110127010010.000|CC1|SEVERAL STUDENTS WERE TAKEN INTO
20110127010010.000|20110127010010.000|CC1|CUSTODY.                        
20110127010010.000|20110127010012.000|CC1|THIS ALL STARTED WHEN TWO       
20110127010012.000|20110127010014.000|CC1|STUDENTS GOT INTO AN ARGUMENT ON
20110127010014.000|20110127010015.000|CC1|CAMPUS AND ONE OF THE STUDENTS  
20110127010015.000|20110127010017.000|CC1|ALLEGEDLY THREATENED TO BRING A 
20110127010017.000|20110127010020.000|CC1|GUN OR MADE SOME SORT OF GESTURE
20110127010020.000|20110127010021.000|CC1|THAT HE HAD A GUN.              
20110127010021.000|20110127010023.000|CC1|SOMETIME LATER THE OTHER STUDENT
20110127010023.000|20110127010024.000|CC1|THEN TOLD SCHOOL STAFF WHAT HAD 
20110127010024.000|20110127010026.000|CC1|HAPPENED, AND THAT'S WHEN THE   
20110127010026.000|20110127010028.000|CC1|LOCKDOWN WENT INTO EFFECT.      
20110127010028.000|20110127010030.000|CC1|FORTUNATELY THIS TIME THE       
20110127010030.000|20110127010031.000|CC1|LOCKDOWN LASTED LESS THAN AN    
20110127010031.000|20110127010033.000|CC1|HOUR, AND STUDENTS WERE RELEASED
20110127010033.000|20110127010035.000|CC1|ABOUT 4:00, NORMALLY THEY GET   
20110127010035.000|20110127010039.000|CC1|OUT AT 3:15.                    
20110127010039.000|20110127010040.000|CC1|ALL IS CALM NOW.                
20110127010040.000|20110127010041.000|CC1|THE STUDENTS WE TALKED TO ARE   
20110127010041.000|20110127010042.000|CC1|FRUSTRATED.                     
20110127010042.000|20110127010045.000|CC1|THEY ALSO SAY TODAY'S INCIDENT  
20110127010045.000|20110127010048.000|CC1|WAS THE RESULT OF TENSIONS      
20110127010048.000|20110127010049.000|CC1|BETWEEN TWO ETHNIC GROUPS ON    
20110127010049.000|20110127010049.000|CC1|CAMPUS.

20110127010050.000|20110127010052.000|CC1|PART OF THE STORY COMING UP AT

20110127010533.000|20110127010534.000|CC1|HAVE STARTED NOTICING FOOD      
20110127010534.000|20110127010536.000|CC1|PRICES JUMPING SHARPLY LATE LAST
20110127010536.000|20110127010536.000|CC1|YEAR.

20110127010644.000|20110127010645.000|CC1|>> Reporter: FRESH FRUIT PRICES 
20110127010645.000|20110127010647.000|CC1|WENT UP 4% IN DECEMBER DRIVEN BY
